description:
Cross platform configuration tool for the ExpressLRS firmware


Changelog
- Fix issue with Device Target Form #569
- Unsupported OS Message #562
- Moved query of log file content to GraphQL #536
- Support Separate Targets Repo #566
- Update translations #567
Which file do I need?
- Windows (8, 10, 11): ExpressLRS-Configurator-Setup-1.6.1.exe
- Mac OS X (please
- Linux (please read linux install notes):
- expresslrs-configurator_1.6.1_amd64.deb (Ubuntu, debian)
- expresslrs-configurator-1.6.1.pacman (Arch)
- expresslrs-configurator-1.6.1.x86_64.rpm (Red Hat, Fedora, CentOS)
- flatpak install org.expresslrs.ExpressLRSConfigurator (Flatpak distribution format)
- expresslrs-configurator-1.6.1.zip (others)
